v8:item.v8:content: Scheduled online activities such as data synchronization and emailing are disabled to prevent conflicts with the main infobase. <link Unlock>Enable</>.
Generating a list of scheduled jobs…
If a job is enabled, it is executed according to the schedule.
Date and time when the last background job was completed.
The user on whose behalf the background job will run.
Predefined jobs are part of the app. They cannot be deleted.
Show background jobs completed with errors.
Show background jobs canceled by users.
Show background jobs that are running now.
Scheduled job to be filtered by.
Generating a list of background jobs. Please wait…
Run the scheduled job in this session (for file infobases) or as a background job (for server infobases).
Refresh the list of scheduled jobs.
Users will see the scheduled job progress. Used for debugging.
Show event log records for the selected job.
